name: Bubble Shooter - Fantasy Pop
description:
This captivating game is a brand-new typical bubble shooter with some nice extras. Fantasy Pop stands out from the crowd thanks to an enchanted forest background, flashy animations, and mystery sound providing players with an extraordinary, immersive experience. The ancient forest keeps many magical treasures, mystical chests, and unexpected secrets waiting for you to explore.



HOW TO PLAY:

• Drag to aim, release to shoot, and pop the same-colored bubbles.
• Match and shoot bubbles to collect shining gems.
• Use less shots to score higher and earn stars.
• Create special boosters to help you pass those tricky levels



SPECIAL FEATURES:
• Match 3 bubbles to pop them through hundreds of unique levels!
• Blast bubble shooter skill shots to maximize combos
• Beat levels to unlock a new mysterious chest
• Play games everyday to get special rewards!
• Check back often for fun events and free rewards for Special events
• No WiFi needed. Play anytime, anywhere.

Bubble Shooter - Fantasy Pop not only adds a splash of color into anyone’s day, but it also takes players on a relaxing and brain-training journey through a magical road map.


If you have any questions don’t hesitate to reach us at support+fantasypop@athena.studio


Ready for the challenge? Download Bubble Shooter -Fantasy Pop now to start playing!
